# Vercel Environment Variable Setup

## IMPORTANT: Use Base64-Only Format for Serverless Deployment

⚠️ **Critical for Vercel**: Do NOT include PEM headers (`-----BEGIN/END-----`) in environment variables. Use base64-only format.

## Private Key (SP_PRIVATE_KEY)
Copy the entire content of backend/sp.key as a single line:
```

```

## Certificate (SP_CERT)
Copy the entire content of backend/sp.crt as a single line:
```

```

## Update SAML Service for Vercel

Instead of file-based certificates, use environment variables.
